content.value: LED bulbs are highly durable and efficient.

Unpredictable power cuts can be extremely troublesome, especially if you are in the middle of doing something very important and suddenly, the light goes out. Now you donâ€™t need to worry of any power cuts, because Philips has come up with its latest offering: Philips Inverter bulb. I

t is a 12 Watt Rechargeable Emergency bulb, which promises up to 4 hours of continuous lighting backup during power cuts. It houses a powerful lithium-ion battery, requiring 8-10 hours of charging time. Brightness (Lumen output) becomes 50% when on battery mode.
